newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-SUNDERLAND SIGN NEWCASTLE MIDFIELDER CLARK.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SUNDERLAND SIGN NEWCASTLE MIDFIELDER CLARK.

text.p: Sunderland, relegated from the English premier league last month, have signed Newcastle midfielder Lee Clark for 2.5 million pounds ($4.1 million).

Sunderland will pay an extra 300,000 pounds ($490,000) to Newcastle if they return to the top flight. A further 200,000 pounds ($327,000) will be due should Sunderland qualify for European competition while Clark is on their books.
